name: Rossignol Step In Junior Bindings - Children to Youths
description: Entry level, classic ski binding for kids. They have an automatic step-in function and manual release that can easily be operated with a ski pole. The low profile height keeps them stable through the glide and adds precision through the kick. The geometry gives them a wide contact area for torsional rigidity, power transfer and good ski control.Step-in design automatically clicks closed.Low-profile stack height ensures stability through the glide and creates good snow feel.Compatible with IFP mounting plate only.
